BatchGetItem.name: BatchGetItem
BatchGetItem.description:
The BatchGetItem action returns the attributes of one or more items from one or more
                                                tables.

BatchWriteItem.name: BatchWriteItem
BatchWriteItem.description:
The BatchWriteItem action operation puts or deletes multiple items in one or more
                                                tables.

ConditionCheckItem.name: ConditionCheckItem
ConditionCheckItem.description:
The ConditionCheckItem operation checks the existence of a set of attributes for the
                                                item with the given primary key

CreateCluster.name: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.description: The CreateCluster action creates a DAX cluster.
CreateCluster.dependentActions:
dax:CreateParameterGroup
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   dax:CreateSubnetGroup
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ec2:CreateNetworkInterface
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ec2:DeleteNetworkInterface
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ec2:DescribeNetworkInterfaces
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ec2:DescribeSubnets
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   ec2:DescribeVpcs
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   iam:GetRole
                                                   
                                                
                                                
                                                
                                                   iam:PassRole

CreateParameterGroup.name: CreateParameterGroup
CreateParameterGroup.description:
The CreateParameterGroup action creates collection of parameters that you apply to
                                                all of the nodes in a DAX cluster.

CreateSubnetGroup.name: CreateSubnetGroup
CreateSubnetGroup.description: The CreateSubnetGroup action creates a new subnet group.

DecreaseReplicationFactor.name: DecreaseReplicationFactor
DecreaseReplicationFactor.description: The DecreaseReplicationFactor action removes one or more nodes from a DAX cluster.

DeleteCluster.name: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.description: The DeleteCluster action deletes a previously provisioned DAX cluster.

DeleteItem.name: DeleteItem
DeleteItem.description: The DeleteItem action deletes a single item in a table by primary key.

DeleteParameterGroup.name: DeleteParameterGroup
DeleteParameterGroup.description: The DeleteParameterGroup action deletes the specified parameter group.

DeleteSubnetGroup.name: DeleteSubnetGroup
DeleteSubnetGroup.description: The DeleteSubnetGroup action deletes a subnet group.

DescribeClusters.name: DescribeClusters
DescribeClusters.description: The DescribeClusters action returns information about all provisioned DAX clusters.

DescribeDefaultParameters.name: DescribeDefaultParameters
DescribeDefaultParameters.description:
The DescribeDefaultParameters action returns the default system parameter information
                                                for DAX.

DescribeEvents.name: DescribeEvents
DescribeEvents.description: The DescribeEvents action returns events related to DAX clusters and parameter groups.

DescribeParameterGroups.name: DescribeParameterGroups
DescribeParameterGroups.description: The DescribeParameterGroups action returns a list of parameter group descriptions.

DescribeParameters.name: DescribeParameters
DescribeParameters.description:
The DescribeParameters action returns the detailed parameter list for a particular
                                                parameter group.

DescribeSubnetGroups.name: DescribeSubnetGroups
DescribeSubnetGroups.description: The DescribeSubnetGroups action returns a list of subnet group descriptions.

GetItem.name: GetItem
GetItem.description:
The GetItem action returns a set of attributes for the item with the given primary
                                                key.

IncreaseReplicationFactor.name: IncreaseReplicationFactor
IncreaseReplicationFactor.description: The IncreaseReplicationFactor action adds one or more nodes to a DAX cluster.

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: The ListTags action returns a list all of the tags for a DAX cluster.

PutItem.name: PutItem
PutItem.description: The PutItem action creates a new item, or replaces an old item with a new item.

Query.name: Query
Query.description:
The Query action finds items based on primary key values. You can query any table
                                                or secondary index that has a composite primary key (a partition key and a sort key).

RebootNode.name: RebootNode
RebootNode.description: The RebootNode action reboots a single node of a DAX cluster.

Scan.name: Scan
Scan.description:
The Scan action returns one or more items and item attributes by accessing every item
                                                in a table or a secondary index.

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: The TagResource action associates a set of tags with a DAX resource.

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: The UntagResource action removes the association of tags from a DAX resource.

UpdateCluster.name: UpdateCluster
UpdateCluster.description: The UpdateCluster action modifies the settings for a DAX cluster.

UpdateItem.name: UpdateItem
UpdateItem.description:
The UpdateItem action edits an existing item's attributes, or adds a new item to the
                                                table if it does not already exist.

UpdateParameterGroup.name: UpdateParameterGroup
UpdateParameterGroup.description: The UpdateParameterGroup action modifies the parameters of a parameter group.

UpdateSubnetGroup.name: UpdateSubnetGroup
UpdateSubnetGroup.description: The UpdateSubnetGroup action modifies an existing subnet group.
